name: The Cooking Game
description: Start The Cooking Game, learn to cook, serve and manage your own restaurants. Show your skills and feed the hungry customers!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7/8/10 Processor: Pentium IV 1.2 Ghz processor or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Graphics card or greater Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great addictive game with cartoony graphics and original music. I love the Chef on the Go feature which allows you to play for highscore against the other users. Try beating my scores for Restaurant 1 - Fast Food ! B-)
Addicting game, It has amazing animations and music and its a good family game. Can't take my eyes off of this game. But can someone tell me how to make the dry noodles and noodles soup?

Love it Very entertaining. Love the characters, they are adorable which makes it playing even more fun Love the fact that it has so many different stages and restaurants.  Many hours of gameplay ahead! A friend recommended this game and Im glad that he did! Doing the same now!

Wonderful Chef game where you parctice lots of recipes and cooking styles as well as having to serve your customers. Oh i almost forgot you have to decorate your restaurant and grow your business too. Definitely recommended for fans of strategy or management games.  Great game so far. One of the best restaurant games I've played yet

I like this game very very very much. It has 240 levels and it has hundreds of dishes. Cant wait for the mexican restaurant to be live! The graphics are nice, cartoony, indie like. Probably one of the best games ever!!!! :-D I have nothing bad to say about it
